viewData.name: Lenovo 13.3" Ideapad 730S Laptop
viewData.short_description: Buy Lenovo 13.3" Ideapad 730S Laptop featuring 1.8 GHz Intel Core i7-8565U Quad-Core, 16GB LPDDR3 | 512GB M.2 NVMe SSD 13.3" 1920 x 1080 IPS Display. Review Lenovo 730S
viewData.long_description: The 13.3" Ideapad 730S Notebook from Lenovo is a thin and compact system made of aluminum to keep it lightweight and durable. Specs-wise, it's equipped with a 1.8 GHz Intel Core i7-8565U quad-core processor, 16GB of LPDDR3 RAM, and a 512GB M.2 NVMe SSD. With these combined, this laptop can easily handle everyday tasks and load applications quickly. Its 13.3" IPS display, driven by integrated Intel UHD graphics, features a crisp 1920 x 1080 Full HD resolution. Other integrated features include Thunderbolt 3 and USB Type-C ports, one of which supports Always-On charging, 802.11ac Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 4.1, a webcam, microphone, speakers, and a 3.5mm combo audio jack. The operating system installed is Windows 10 (64-Bit).
